text.section: The owner of a business or the owner's designee shall apply on behalf of the business for a license under this subtitle.

section.section:
An applicant for a license shall:
submit to the Secretary an application on the form that the Secretary provides;
submit a passport-size photograph, taken within 6 months immediately preceding the date of the filing of the application, of each of the following individuals:
provide any other documents or information required by this section or required by the Secretary; and
pay to the Secretary an application fee set by the Secretary.

text.section: The applicant owner or designee shall sign the application under oath.

The application form provided by the Secretary shall contain a statement advising the applicant that willfully making a false statement on an application is a misdemeanor, subject to a fine or imprisonment or both, as provided under § 12.5-504 of this title.
